page.title: 11Lane Head, Factories-Longnor
page.content:
{Lane Head} Lane Head has two sets of houses. One lot are bungalows which are on the main road and were built about 15 years ago. Old people live in them so they do not have to climb stairs, which is much better for them. The second lot of houses are about 9 years old and are lived in by fairly young people. They are behind the old people's bungalows.
{New Factories} In Longnor there are two new factories which are two years old. One is called Paul Edens Clocks. He went bankrupt but is now back in Longnor, but not in business. The other factory is called Micro Plants. They sell plants, but not to the public. They are doing quite well. Both of the factories have the same accommodation.
